parts._description: Toggle which NeTEx parts to include in generation. The framework, gml, and root XSDs are always included. See docs/subset-selection-guide.md for details on each part.

framework.description: Base types, reusable components, organizations, utility types, frames. Always required.

gml.description: Geographic coordinates (GML standard). Required by any part with location data.

part1_network.description: Network topology: routes, lines, stop places, scheduled stop points, timing patterns.

part2_timetable.description: Timetables: service journeys, vehicle services, dated calls, passing times. Depends on part1.

part3_fares.description: Fares: fare products, pricing, distribution, sales transactions. Depends on part1.

part5_new_modes.description: New modes: mobility services, vehicle meeting points. Self-contained (framework only).

siri.description: Real-time updates (SIRI standard). Required — NeTEx_publication.xsd unconditionally imports SIRI.

service.description: NeTEx service definitions (filters, aggregator). Required — included by NeTEx_publication.xsd.

rootXsds._description: Root-level XSD files to include. NeTEx_publication.xsd is always required.

ifopt.description: IFOPT standard for fixed objects in public transport. Required by part1.

publication.description: Top-level entry point — PublicationDelivery document wrapper. Always required.
